name: Mersey Maritime
goal: Mersey Maritime is a not for profit maritime cluster organisation which represents stakeholders from business, education, and local government in the Liverpool City region in shipping, ports and logistics, and offshore energy. Its direct membership is around 200 organisations.
interests: Economic and Financial Affairs, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Fisheries and Aquaculture, Research and Technology, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: Mersey Maritimes main interests are maritime affairs including: shipping, maritime transport and logistics, ship repair construction, offshore energy, maritime finance and insurance. The organisation is active at UK national and regional level through the UK Chamber of Shipping.
